thread.title: Snap IPO: A $22 Billion Test for the Unsocial Social Network and Its Elusive Founder
thread.title_full: Snap IPO: A $22 Billion Test for the Unsocial Social Network and Its Elusive Founder - WSJ

author: Betsy Morris
title: Snap IPO: A $22 Billion Test for the Unsocial Social Network and Its Elusive Founder
text:
Mark Zuckerberg says he created Facebook Inc. to make the world more open and connected. Twitter Inc. says it wants to give everyone the power to share ideas instantly.

Snap Inc., which this week could become the biggest technology public offering in years, is the unsocial social-media company. Not only does its app feature messages that disappear, the company defiantly operates unlike most Silicon Valley outfits, where...
